front.title: IEEE Draft Trial-Use Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Information Via XML, Exchanging Test Adapter Information

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document specifies an exchange format, utilizing XML, for identifying all of the hardware, software, and documentation associated with a test station. This test station may be used as a component of a test program set (TPS) to test and diagnose a unit under test (UUT).
